author: barnabasbusa
content:
Devnet timeline update:

We plan to launch devnet 12 today at 13:00 UTC. https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/dencun-devnet-12

Dencun fork will take place at epoch 220, which is tomorrow ~~~8:20 UTC~~ 12:28UTC.  (This is to help us collect some pre-dencun metrics)

We plan to shut down devnet 11 tomorrow end of the day. 

We going to launch with the same validator split as devnet 11.  Devnet 11 might going to have a short period of non finality, as the arm machines need to be recycled for devnet 12.

author: tersec
content: is there (going to be) a builder API relay for devnet-12?

author: parithosh
content: Yup! The whole setup will be present and tested, probably turned on on few nodes right now and all nodes after we can validate base blob functionality is fine.
